name: tm68
effect: Teaches Giga Impact to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Giga Impact to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user charges the foe using every
bit of its power. It must rest on the
next turn to recover.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user charges the foe using every
bit of its power. It must rest on the
next turn to recover.

The user charges the foe using every
bit of its power. It must rest on the
next turn to recover.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user charges at the target using
every bit of its power.
The user must rest on the next turn.

The user charges at the target using

every bit of its power.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may
also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.
